quiz1_questions.question: You get an email from your friend. It looks oddly suspicious from the other messages he sends. What should you do?
options: Download and view the pdf! Nothing bad can happen.
Talk to your friend and see if it was really him you sent it.
Preview the pdf, but don't download it. There might be a really funny joke placed inside!
explanation: Well... if it doesn't seem right maybe go ask someone.
Correct! Ask your friend, he might have been hacked! Telling your other friends who might have gotten the email may save them.
Is it worth the risk? Opening a dangerous file might destroy your computer.
Although it is good to stay safe. Asking around might help your other friends.
